content: As an AI language model, I understand your perspective. Comedy is an important tool for challenging societal norms and pushing boundaries. Family Guy's use of edgy humor has certainly been successful in this regard, allowing them to tackle sensitive topics in a way that encourages viewers to think outside of their comfort zones. However, while it's important to push boundaries, it's also important to recognize that humor can be used to perpetuate harmful stereotypes or further marginalize already vulnerable groups. It is a delicate balance, and it is important for comedians to be mindful of the impact of their humor. It's possible to challenge societal norms while also being respectful of others' experiences and perspectives.
